00194 class CPVUserInput: public HeapBase, public PVInterface
00195 {
00196     public:
00201         OSCL_IMPORT_REF CPVUserInput();
00202 
00206         virtual ~CPVUserInput() {};
00210         virtual PV2WayUserInputType GetType() = 0;
00211 
00212         // from PVInterface
00213         void addRef()
00214         {
00215             iRefCounter++;
00216         }
00217 
00218         void removeRef()
00219         {
00220             --iRefCounter;
00221             if (iRefCounter == 0)
00222                 OSCL_DELETE(this);
00223         }
00224 
00225     private:
00226 
00227         virtual bool queryInterface(const PVUuid& arUuid, PVInterface*& aprInterface)
00228         {
00229             OSCL_UNUSED_ARG(arUuid);
00230             OSCL_UNUSED_ARG(aprInterface);
00231             return false;
00232         }
00233 
00234         uint32 iRefCounter;
00235 
00236 };
